tweet_text:
A chihuahua

Straight up started barking as loud as it could possibly barked. If that wasn't enough, it immediately ran towards the gate. Me.

As it ran towards the gate, I realised the gate is not meshed & the grilles are wide enough for the dog to run through with ease
